function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient rodent control measures leading to increased rat populations","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of infectious diseases carried by rats","Mitigation":"Implementing effective rodent control measures that do not harm non-target species and are resistant to rodenticide resistance","Technologies":"Integrated pest management, rodent exclusion techniques, and habitat modification","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Local government, pest control companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate design and management of urban green spaces","Impact":"Increased carrying capacity for urban rat populations and higher risk of infectious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing preventive design in landscape structures, sanitation of garbage stations, and reducing food availability","Technologies":"Integrated pest management, vegetation management, and habitat modification","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, landscape architects"},{"Description":"Introduction of open surface water in urban design","Impact":"Potential increase in breeding sites for disease-carrying vectors such as mosquitoes","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to prevent mosquito breeding, such as using mosquito larvicides and maintaining water quality","Technologies":"Mosquito larvicides, water quality monitoring, and aquatic habitat management","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, environmental agencies"}]}
